metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16115 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, a stack-based buffer under-read could be triggered in IdentityFunction::transform in Function.cc, used by GfxAxialShading::getColor. It can, for example, be triggered by sending a crafted PDF document to the pdftoppm tool. It allows an attacker to use a crafted PDF file to cause Denial of Service or possibly unspecified other impact.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication that this affects poppler ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
